statements: SELECT * FROM ChatMessages WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id FROM ChatMessages WHERE message_text LIKE '%hello%'
SELECT timestamp, message_text FROM ChatMessages WHERE receiver_id = '723e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
SELECT * FROM ChatMessages ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT sender_id, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM ChatMessages GROUP BY sender_id

SELECT sender_id, COUNT(*) AS total_messages FROM ChatMessages GROUP BY sender_id ORDER BY total_messages DESC;
SELECT * FROM ChatMessages WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND receiver_id = 'aabbccdd-1234-5678-9876-abcdef123456';
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, MIN(timestamp) AS first_message_sent FROM ChatMessages GROUP BY sender_id, receiver_id;
